name: OmanaC: collective consciousness Inst 2
description:
Omanac  is a  interactive Trading  card game  turned RPG found at Omana amino. (artist forum )where  you collect OC cards and tabletop you way to victory!  OmanaC RPG takes those  same 194*+ cards and puts them into a  different battle system and world of everyday people  as you embody a former champion  of a small  town O.m.a.n.a.C open card  tournament coming back home after 4 years . 

O.M.A.N.A.  Discord ( Channel OmanaC )

Rated T (Teen)** have content that may be suitable for ages 13 and older. Titles in this category may contain violence, suggestive themes, crude humor, minimal blood, simulated gambling, and/or infrequent use of strong language.

**( Rating pending)
